reviewText: Got this whole package for around $25. Good solid sports movies. Rocky says "Go For It!" Buy it a low price.

Four classic sports movies at a great price! Rocky, the ultimate underdog hero, Hoosiers, work hard - play hard, Bull Durham, best baseball movie ever made, and Raging Bull, a black and white masterpiece on a black and blue boxing champ.  Wow!!!!  Recommended (highly).
Great movies, love 'em all over again in Blu-Ray. Great service & quality as usual, can't wait to ad to my collection.

This blu-ray bundle contains four of the best sports-themed movies ever made. "Hoosiers" represents basketball; "Bull Durham" represents baseball; "Rocky" and "Raging Bull" represent boxing. These movies are about a lot more than just winning a game; these characters are are struggling not just with sports, but with life. "Rocky" is my personal favorite of the bunch - but each of the movies features an interesting story and great performances. Please note that this is not a box set, it is just the four movies sold together - each movie comes in its own separate blu-ray case. As for why these four films and not others, it's simple: these four are all owned by MGM. But there are many other films that I'd recommend if you want a complete sports collection on blu-ray... Field of Dreams, Rudy, Remember the Titans, Seabiscuit, and Chariots of Fire. Here are the links to the individual releases (prices are always changing, so sometimes it might be cheaper to buy the films individually): Rocky (Two-Disc Blu-ray/DVD Combo in Blu-ray Packaging) Raging Bull [Blu-ray] Bull Durham [Blu-ray] Hoosiers [Blu-ray]
